name: Toy Soldiers (itch)
description:
Toy Soldiers is a puzzle game inspired by classic browser games. Your goal is to move blocks into holes by directing your soldiers using tiles. Please leave a comment!

Toy Soldiers was created for the 2020 Brackeys Game Jam, where the theme was Rewind. My original idea for this game incorporated the theme much better, but it has slowly drifted away and become something else. Oh well.
